body.name: Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 19-55 Inches TVs, Swivel TV Wall Mount with Articulating Arms Extension Tilt, TV Bracket Wall Mount with Single Stud Center Design, Max VESA 400x400mm Up to 70lbs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 14 mins
features: TV Mount Compatibility - This full motion tv mount matchs with 19-55 Inches flat or curved TVs with VESA patterns range from 75x75mm to 400x400mm that holds up to 70lbs TVS, perfect for Vizio, Panasonic, Sony, Samsung, LG, Sharp, Toshiba, Philips, TCL, etc. Single wood stud, brick or concrete wall mounting allows you to freely locate your TV and simplify the television placement on the wall. Please check the TV VESA, weight, size before purchasing.

TV Wall Mount Swivel & Tilt - Features of 180°swivel and +5°/-15°tilt to provide full range of motion so that you can customize your view angle at a comfortable distance. That 16.2” extension from the wall lets your screen always follow your sight, you can also level +/-3°after installation for a flexible adjustment. This wall mount tv bracket can retract a mere 2” from the wall to help position screen at any corner of the house and fold to tuck-in closely to wall while TV left unused.

TV Bracket with Strong Articulating Arm - Our wall tv mount is equipped with three heavy duty arms by SPCC cold rolled steel for double stability and absolute performance. 100% welded by automatic robot, this swivel tv mount makes all joints reinforced enough to secure tv mounting. That 4 times load-bearing test before production helps hold your TV steady and ensure safety when arm extends far away without bends and droops, totally a sturdy tv mount you can trust in.

Stylish Mounting Perfect for Corners - Designed of one piece of chic “X-shape” wall plate, this tv wall bracket offers enough space for cable organization and ventilation. Such a single stud tv mount makes it ideal to position a TV into a corner of a room while use full motion capability to adjust your TV for better leisure TV time. Displaying your screen on the wall, mount your tv to eye level, greatly improve your posture for productive work.

Install Your TV Mount in Minutes - Our tv wall mount comes with all required mounting hardware to help you install without any hassle. Mount it as a corner tv mount, also perfect for bedroom, living room, kitchen, studio, office, bars, etc. We are devoted to providing a quick and straightforward hassle-free setup, moreover, completely safe and functional for total protection. Customer technical support answers your pre-purchase and installation questions.

ABOUT NUYOAH TV WALL MOUNT At NUYOAH, we set the standard for TV mount technology. Using innovative design and outstanding safety features, our TV mounts allow you to have the best TV viewing experience no matter where you're sitting. Will this tv wall mount fit our TV ？ Please check the TV specs below: 1. TV size and weight. 2. TV VESA pattern and cable outlet. 3. The wall type of mounting location (wood stud spacing/ solid concrete wall). How to measure VESA ？ VESA patterns are measured by the center of one mounting hole to the center of another on the back of a television in millimeters. Does it come with all necessary hardware to mount ？ Yes, Nuyoah packages are included with TV bolts and wall installation hardware needed to complete the installation. Will this TV Mount work on drywall or plaster walls ？ For safety consideration, Nuyoah TV Mount are only recommeded for wood studs , solid concrete or brick walls, but not drywall alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount did not work as expected. Cheaply made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Thin weak metal
reviews.reviewText: Amazon ad says good for 55" TV up to 70 lbs box says 55" tv/50 kgs. My tv is 55" and weighs 20 kg/44 lbs. As soon as I let go of tv upon mounting, the backing plate bent and twisted. Had to catch TV to prevent serious damage. Started return process immediately. Would NOT recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for an RV
reviews.reviewText: These mounts are fairly light-weight, so DON'T try to hag a plasma TV from them. That being said, they are perfect for mounting TV inside of RV trailers (just make sure at least one of the fasteners anchors to a stud). They've got a great range of motion and allow for plenty of adjustment so that you can change the viewing angle in the event that you're in a small space and need to maneuver the screen to accommodate visitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very cheap! Horrible mount!
reviews.reviewText: Please do not purchase this if you want an easy install! Also, do not purchase this if your TV is ANY bigger than 32"! Flimsy, not well thought out, NO hook or quick disconnect or easy wall mount whatsoever! All s"swivel" points are of lowest quality. And will probably fail within weeks or days of installation! I could build a better mount out of 2X4's and bailing wire!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: 39 inch tv weighing 35 lbs causing it to sag. It's cheap thin metal. If you go to move it it feels like it's just gonna fall. I have installed over 20 full motion mounts from tvs 85in to 32 in . This was thr worst mount I have ever seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won’t hold tv straight
reviews.reviewText: The mount has a dial which is supposed to be used to fix the angle of the tv (up or down) that’s wedged in between the metal which makes it impossible to use the fingers on one hand to tighten so basically you use 2 hands ( or 2 fingers on each hand) to spin the dial tight, which makes it very difficult to tighten even without the tv mounted to it. Extremely poor design. My tv weighed about 40lbs and the mount wouldn’t tighten to keep the tv facing straight ahead. (Level)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I've bought bad products before but this one takes the cake
reviews.reviewText: If I could give it zero stars I would. I have a 40 inch tv and this thing just couldn't handle the weight at all and my tv is pretty lightweight. It just kept tilting forward no matter how many times i try to adjust, remove and remount again. It's also a pain to install on a 400 x 200 vesa configuration. Jesus Christ I have never had such a problem with a mount before but this one came with every problem under the sun.- Tilts forward- Missing screws/materials- Flimsy extender plates- Arm bends cause it can't even handle the lightest of tvs- etc. etc. etc.After my 12th try to remove, reinstall, readjust and remount I just gave up and that's hard for me to say cause even on a broken product I try my best to find workarounds but this one, no matter how many workarounds I've tried it just didn't work. Now I have holes on a wall that I need to plaster and repaint.Returning, hope I can get my money back for this thing but man I have never been so disappointed in a tv mount product as much as this one.Had high hopes for it but was let down ;-(
